itunes:title: Episode 782 - The George Floyd Trial
title: Episode 782 - The George Floyd Trial
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway give their reactions to the Meghan Markle and Prince Harry interview with Oprah, the George Floyd trial being paused so that the prosecution can seek lesser charges against former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin s...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway give their reactions to the Meghan Markle and Prince Harry interview with Oprah, the George Floyd trial being paused so that the prosecution can seek lesser charges against former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin so that it will be easier to convict him, and Burger King’s International Women’s Day tweet.
